title: Wheel of Fish
description: Contestants compete to win their weight in fish. Will they keep the fish or risk it all for a mystery box prize?
altHero: a woman reaches up to spin big game show wheel that is covered in various fish
alt1: show hostess presents a Wheel of Fish game board with differently colored rows of fish iconography
alt2: host Kuni in front of three contestants
alt3: show hostess brings out a giant dead fish
